00029 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #include "ht32.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */

00037 /** @addtogroup LEDC_Examples LEDC
00038   * @{
00039   */

00041 /** @addtogroup 7-SegmentDigitalDisplay
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 const u8 NumberChar[]={
00047   /* a: Seg4(0x10), b: Seg7(0x80), c: Seg2(0x04), d: Seg5(0x20),
00048      e: Seg3(0x08), f: Seg0(0x01), g: Seg6(0x40), dp: Seg1(0x02) */
00049   0xBD, /* '0' = a+b+c+d+e+f      = 0x10 + 0x80 + 0x04 + 0x20 + 0x08 + 0x01               = 0xBD */
00050   0x84, /* '1' =   b+c+           =        0x80 + 0x04                                    = 0x84 */
00051   0xF8, /* '2' = a+b  +d+e  +g    = 0x10 + 0x80 +        0x20 + 0x08 +      + 0x40        = 0xF8 */
00052   0xF4, /* '3' = a+b+c+d    +g    = 0x10 + 0x80 + 0x04 + 0x20 +             + 0x40        = 0xF4 */
00053   0xC5, /* '4' =   b+c    +f+g    =        0x80 + 0x04               + 0x01 + 0x40        = 0xC5 */
00054   0x75, /* '5' = a  +c+d  +f+g    = 0x10        + 0x04 + 0x20        + 0x01 + 0x40        = 0x75 */
00055   0x7D, /* '6' = a  +c+d+e+f+g    = 0x10        + 0x04 + 0x20 + 0x08 + 0x01 + 0x40        = 0x7D */
00056   0x95, /* '7' = a+b+c    +f      = 0x10 + 0x80 + 0x04               + 0x01               = 0x95 */
00057   0xFD, /* '8' = a+b+c+d+e+f+g    = 0x10 + 0x80 + 0x04 + 0x20 + 0x08 + 0x01 + 0x40        = 0xFD */
00058   0xF5, /* '9' = a+b+c+d  +f+g    = 0x10 + 0x80 + 0x04 + 0x20        + 0x01 + 0x40        = 0xF5 */
00059   0x02  /* '.' =               dp =                                                  0x02 = 0x02 */
00060 };
00061 
00062 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 void LEDC_Configuration(void);
00064 void GPIO_Configuration(void);
00065 
00066 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 extern bool gIsUpdateChar;
00068 
00069 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Main program.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 int main(void)
00075 {
00076   u8 CharIndex=0;
00077   u8 CharSize = sizeof(NumberChar);
00078   GPIO_Configuration();
00079   LEDC_Configuration();
00080   while (1)
00081   {
00082     if(gIsUpdateChar)
00083     {
00084       /* The character has been displayed for 1 second, and the new character will be replaced.*/
00085       LEDC_SetData(HTCFG_LEDC_COM_D1,  NumberChar[CharIndex++%CharSize]);
00086       LEDC_SetData(HTCFG_LEDC_COM_D2,  NumberChar[CharIndex++%CharSize]);
00087       LEDC_SetData(HTCFG_LEDC_COM_D3,  NumberChar[CharIndex++%CharSize]);
00088       LEDC_SetData(HTCFG_LEDC_COM_D4,  NumberChar[CharIndex++%CharSize]);
00089       gIsUpdateChar = FALSE;
00090     }
00091   }
00092 }
00093 FlagStatus st;
00094 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00095   * @brief  Configure the LEDC.
00096   * @retval None
00097   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00098 void LEDC_Configuration(void)
00099 {
00100   LEDC_InitTypeDef LEDC_InitStruct;
00101 
00102   /* Turn on the APB clock of LEDC. */
00103   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00104   CKCUClock.Bit.LEDC       = 1;
00105   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00106 
00107   /* Frame = fCK_LED / (LEDC_DutyClockNumber * COM Number) */
00108   /*       = 1600 / (8*4)  =  50Hz */
00109   LEDC_InitStruct.LEDC_ClockSource    = LEDC_SRC_LSI;                    /* LSI = 32Khz */
00110   LEDC_InitStruct.LEDC_ClockPrescaler = HTCFG_LEDC_CLOCK_PRESCAL - 1;    /* fCK_LED = 32Khz / 20 = 1600 Hz */
00111   LEDC_InitStruct.LEDC_DutyClockNumber = HTCFG_LEDC_DUTY_CLOCK_NUMBER;   /* Duty CLock Number = 8 Clock */
00112   LEDC_InitStruct.LEDC_COMxEN = HTCFG_LEDC_COM1EN | HTCFG_LEDC_COM2EN |\
00113                                 HTCFG_LEDC_COM3EN | HTCFG_LEDC_COM4EN;   /* Enable COMx */
00114 
00115   /* Change the brightness, the parameter range is 0~Duty (CLock Number-1.) */
00116   /* 0: the brightest, 7: the darkest.                                      */
00117   LEDC_InitStruct.LEDC_DeadTime = 0; 
00118   LEDC_Init(&LEDC_InitStruct);                                            /* LEC initialization. */
00119 
00120   /* Set the LEDC mode to COMMON_CATHODE. */
00121   LEDC_SetPolarityMode(HTCFG_LEDC_COM1POL | HTCFG_LEDC_COM2POL | HTCFG_LEDC_COM3POL | HTCFG_LEDC_COM4POL,
00122                        LEDC_SEG0POL | LEDC_SEG1POL | LEDC_SEG2POL | LEDC_SEG3POL |\
00123                        LEDC_SEG4POL | LEDC_SEG5POL | LEDC_SEG6POL | LEDC_SEG7POL,
00124                        COMMON_CATHODE);
00125 
00126   LEDC_IntConfig(ENABLE);                                                 /* Enable frame interrupt. */
00127   NVIC_EnableIRQ(LEDC_IRQn); /* Enable LECD IRQ. */
00128   LEDC_Cmd(ENABLE);          /* LEDC Start. */
00129 }
00130 
00131 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00132   * @brief  Configure the GPIO ports.
00133   * @retval None
00134   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00135 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00136 {
00137   /* Turn on the APB clock of AFIO. */
00138   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00139   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00140   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00141 
00142   /* SEG0~7 */
00143   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG0_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00144   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG1_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00145   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG2_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00146   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG3_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00147   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG4_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG4_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00148   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG5_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG5_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00149   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG6_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG6_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00150   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_SEG7_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_SEG7_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00151 
00152   /* COM0~4 */
00153   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_COM0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_COM0_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00154   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_COM1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_COM1_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00155   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_COM2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_COM2_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00156   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LEDC_COM3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LEDC_COM3_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_LEDC);
00157 }
